cloud_connect_vrack_associate_descriptio: To configure your OVHcloud Connect solution, you will need to attach it to a vRack. Select the vRack you want to attach from the following dropdown list, or order a new vRack by clicking here.
cloud_connect_vrack_associate_success: The vRack is now attached to your OVHcloud Connect solution.
cloud_connect_vrack_associate_error: Unable to attach vRack to OVHcloud Connect solution: {{ message }}
